title: Levelling up system
body:
So I just hit level forty. And this emote...
It costs Blue Essense to actually make it perma...

I'd think that when you play this hard you'd get the reward free of charge.
And the 'Glorious Champion Capsule' is a joke.
- Nunu
- Miss Fortune
- Braum

I can't even buy a 3150 champion.

replies.body:
All my honour capsules and all my level up capsules have been trash.

This games reward system has become a fucking garbage dump.

Everyone knows it, everyone is saying so.

Rito won't listen because it isn't Rito anymore.
It's a bunch of douchebags who buy companies and ruin them.
